name: Agent Host
author: AWENK AUDICO
description: Acts as an autonomous agent on the canvas, using connected nodes as its tools, brain, and prompt to achieve a high-level objective.

input_ports.name: payload_input
input_ports.tooltip: Standard data input for the agent.

tool_ports.name: brain_port
tool_ports.tooltip: Connect a single AI Provider or local model node here to act as the agent's brain.

tool_ports.name: prompt_port
tool_ports.tooltip: Connect a node that provides the agent's objective/prompt string.

tool_ports.name: tools_port
tool_ports.tooltip: Connect one or more modules here to serve as tools for the agent.

output_schema.name: data.agent_final_answer
output_schema.description: The final answer or result from the agent after completing its objective.

output_schema.name: data.agent_interaction_log
output_schema.description: A step-by-step log of the agent's thoughts, actions, and observations.
